cmput301.f13t01.createyourownadventure

Class Choice

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301.f13t01.createyourownadventure.Choice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Choice
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is a simple object that will contain the information related to a particular choice, which will allow the transition from one fragment to another while reading.
    Author:
    Reginald Miller, October 2013
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
